name: df-tms
body: |- wceq(ctms, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cxmet)), co(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cdm(cdm(cv(s0)))), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), cv(s0))), csts, cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, cv(s0))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ toMetSp =(s0 ∈ ⋃ ran(*Met)↦({ <(Base ` ndx), dom(dom(s0))>, <(dist ` ndx), s0 > }[sSet]<(TopSet ` ndx),(MetOpen ` s0)>))
comment: Define the function mapping a metric to the metric space which it defines. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
